Description:
A set of six linen cocktail napkins, featuring three different beetles motifs in rich earthy hues. The Ajour is hand embroidered using a contrasting thread.Expertly made by the women at the Malaika Embroidery Training Centre (TOH) in Cairo.
Size:12cm x 22cm4.8" x 8.7"
100% Linen

Framed with a geometric carnation motif inspired by Ottoman samplers and a zig-zag border, these bold place cards in cardinal red are undeniably eye-catching.Perfect for displaying the names of your dinner guests, our Ottoman Carnation Place Cards will bring elegance and style to any tablescape. Pair with our Ottoman Carnation Cards for a seamless table setting no guest will forget. 300gsm paper card.
Size: 10cm x 6cm

A most charming jar, pretty enough to decorate a shelf, but also practical for use in the kitchen.
Size (diameter):8cm width - 12cm height3.1" - 4.7"Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

How about the Felucca Guest Towels for your bathroom? These exquisite linen towels feature two different hand painted and hand embroidered Feluccas and a delicate Ajour seam at the bottom.
Handcrafted at the Malaika Embroidery Training Centre (TOH) in Cairo.Size: 40cm x 70cm15.8" x 27.6"
Material: 100% Linen

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / red
Description:
Our Camomile collection was inspired by a vintage copper monogram plate, gifted to us by a dear friend of Malaika’s.
Camomile flowers are delicately hand-embroidered and are scattered on the bedding. The Ancient Egyptians, like many of us today, appreciated the calming properties of camomile. So, what better way to inspire a good night’s sleep.Malaika’s bedding is woven from the highest quality Egyptian cotton percale. Our 320-thread-count bedding has a unique feel; the fabric is the perfect combination of a silky-smooth touch and crispness, that only gets better with time. We are proud to make products that last a lifetime.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

So, what better way to inspire a good night’s sleep.Malaika’s bedding is woven from the highest quality Egyptian cotton percale. Our 320-thread-count bedding has a unique feel; the fabric is the perfect combination of a silky-smooth touch and crispness, that only gets better with time. We are proud to make products that last a lifetime.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

With vibrant golden wheat motifs set against rich blue and turquoise foliage, this plate evokes the warmth of harvest under a clear Mediterranean sky. Handcrafted in the oasis village of Fayoum.
Size (diameter):25cm - 27cm9.8" - 10.6"Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Snuggle up in these sumptuous goose down duvets, made in Germany by a long-established manufacturer.
Cot Size: 100cm x 135cm39.4" x 53.1"
SUMMERThe 3 tog sommer-weight duvets are filled with 100% white goose down, which makes them beautifully light. They are encased in luxurious cotton percale and stitched with an internal box construction for evenly distributed downs. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers.
WINTERThe 14 tog winter-weight duvets are filled with 100% white goose down, which makes them warm yet beautifully light and comfortable to sleep under. They are encased in luxurious cotton percale and stitched with an internal box construction for evenly distributed warmth. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers.

Hand printed and intricately hand embroidered by the talented women atThreads of Hope, this cushion will add old charm to your bed or sofa. Soane Britain's inspiration for theirFiligree Flowerfabric, was an 18th-century Ottoman sash. Leaves and flowers dance as if in water on this romantic print, recalling the mood and imagery of Egyptian tomb paintings. With metallic thread detailing, this bolster takes 20 days to embroider.

Product: DOWN PADS FOR PILLOWS AND CUSHIONS
Description:
Our natural goose down pads will give your bed cushions a luxuriously plump look and feel, for unparalleled comfort. The pads are manufactured in Germany by a long-established manufacturer.
Each pad in pillow size* has three chambers, a firm centre and two soft exterior chambers. This gives the pad a firm support with a soft touch. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers. All other sizes have one chamber (down 95% and feathers 5%).
*Sizes 40cm x 80cm, 50cm x 75cm, 50cm x 90cm and 80cm x 80cm.

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / teal
Description:
Refresh your bedroom décor with this beautifully embellished bedding collection.
Woven in the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is hand-embroidered with vines of feather stitches on large pleated borders.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.

and crafted in the oasis village of Tunis in Fayoum, using an art form that dates back to Ancient Egypt, this plate demonstrates the skill of contemporary Egyptian craftsmanship.
Featuring a charming depiction of a branch and painted in rich, autumnal colours, this plate will bring a touch of festivity to any table setting.

Product: DOWN PADS FOR BED PILLOWS AND CUSHIONS
Description:
Our natural goose down pads will give your bed cushions a luxuriously plump look and feel, for unparalleled comfort. The pads are manufactured in Germany by a long-established manufacturer.
Each pad has three chambers*, a firm centre and two soft exterior chambers. This gives the pad a firm support with a soft touch. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers.
*Size 30cm x 41cm and 66cm x 66cm have one chamber (down 95% and feathers 5%)

Each bib is finished with our printed cotton with joyful motifs and features a Velcro™ neck fastening. They are reversible, with plain white terry cloth on the back.
For babies from birth until about 9 months.

100% Cotton

DESCRIPTION
Add a touch of opulence to your bedroom with the Farida collection, inspired by the majestic peacock.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is decorated with finely embroidered peacock feathers in subtle shades of blue and beige.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Hand crafted in the oasis village of Tunis, using an art form that dates back to Ancient Egypt, this shallow bowl’s design features feeding fish and was inspired by its maker’s lakeside surroundings.The bowl’s design will add a touch of naive style to any table while evoking memories of the sea.Maker: Mohamed Mahmoud

We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Material: Glass

Add a touch of whimsy to your living space, with our vibrant Baboon cushion covers. Baboons were worshiped as a symbol of wisdom by the Ancient Egyptians. Reversible, with stripes on the other side, these fun cushions are finished with colourful handmade tassels.
Crafted from natural Egyptian cotton canvas, each cushion is printed by hand and finished with three bright, multi-coloured tassels, hanging from the top corners.
Size: 35cm x 45cm
- Concealed zip closure- 100% Cotton

Our Crocodile Cushion honours an Ancient Egyptian symbol and bringer of good luck. Combining handwoven material with hand embroidery, this cushion will add the warmth of an artisanal piece to your home.Pair with our other Pharos Collection cushions.
Size:30cm x 41cm11.8” x 16”
100% Cotton

Hand printed and intricately hand embroidered by the talented women atThreads of Hope, this bolster will add old charm to your bed or sofa. Soane Britain's inspiration for theirFiligree Flowerfabric, was an 18th-century Ottoman sash. Leaves and flowers dance as if in water on this romantic print, recalling the mood and imagery of Egyptian tomb paintings. With metallic thread detailing, this bolster takes 40 days to embroider.
Size:48 x 120cm18.9” x 47”Material: 100% Stone Linen

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / teal
Description:
Elegant and understated, the Abdeen collection is inspired by one of Cairo’s historic palaces.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is finely embellished with hand-embroidered dots and drawn thread open work, creating an intricate geometric motif.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures
- Pillow cases have an envelope closure
- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
Material: 100% Egyptian Cotton

Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is finely embellished with hand-embroidered dots and drawn thread open work, creating an intricate geometric motif.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures
- Pillow cases have an envelope closure
- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
Material: 100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Hand crafted by a potter in the oasis village of Tunis in Fayoum, this plate’s design was inspired by its maker’s surroundings.
Featuring a playful repeating motif of an acorn in rich, autumnal colours, and crafted into an unusual hexagonal shape, the eclectic and undeniably festive design of this plate will bring style to any celebration.
Maker: Randa Omar
Size: 20cm / 7.8"
Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Drawing inspiration from the decorative oval frame that used to enclose the Egyptian hieroglyphs of royal names, our Cartouche napkin pays homage to ancient Egypt and its traditions, for a fun take on the classics. A highly ornamental object, the cartouche has always reflected changing fashions and tastes. With its simple aesthetic, our napkin aims to be a continuation of that, for an evergreen tablescape.
Available in blue, amber and red.
Size:46cm x46cm18" x 18"100% Linen (Ecru Linen)

Drawing inspiration from the decorative oval frame that used to enclose the Egyptian hieroglyphs of royal names, our Cartouche napkin pays homage to ancient Egypt and its traditions, for a fun take on the classics. Available in blue, amber and red.

Product: AYA AND BES EMBROIDERED BURP CLOTHS (SET OF TWO)
Description:
Hand-crafted in the softest Egyptian terrycloth cotton, these pretty burb cloths make an elegant yet practical baby gift. They are perfectly shaped to fully protect your shoulder.
Each burp cloth is finished with fine cotton featuring happy childhood scenes in the Egyptian coutryside and a lace border in matchiung colour. They are reversible, with plain white terry cloth on the back.
Set includes two burb cloths, measuring 46cm x 23cm, 18" x 9".
100% Cotton

Available in a choice of sizes, these plump, extra-soft goose feather cushion pads will giveyour seating areas maximum comfort.
Each pad is filled with a 100% feather stuffing and encased in a finely woven, anti-dust mite cotton cover.

Delicate ajour and hand embroidery by the accomplished women atThreads of Hope. A set of six napkins, each one embroidered with a leaf or flower motif inspired by an 18c Ottoman sash, which is Soane Britain's inspiration for theirFiligree Flowerfabric. A versatile design that could be used for a celebratory dinner or for Sunday brunch at home.
Size:50cm x 50cm19.7” x 19.7”Material: 100% linen

Hand-carved in Luxor from luminous alabaster, the Gadus Vase blends ancient inspiration with contemporary simplicity. Its gently elongated form and smooth, translucent surface showcase the stone’s natural veining, ensuring that no two pieces are alike.
Please note: alabaster is a porous stone and cannot hold water directly. If using as a vase, insert a glass or a water-filled plastic bag secured with an elastic band to protect the stone.
Measurements:height: 20cm / 7.9"top: 9cm / 3.5" diameterMaterial: Alabaster
Our Alabaster products are entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Featuring the fantastic Egyptian Goddess Nut, goddess of the sky and protector of the world, our ‘Going Nuts' pouch will be with you with its creative flair and practicality.
Perfect for carrying your phone and keys, and with a charming graphic illustration of the Nut on Linen, Going Nuts Pouch is stylish, playful and wholeheartedly unique. Electric Blue Linen, ecru cotton inside,
Size: 19cm  x 12.5cm.
Size:300cm x 160cm118" x 63"100% Linen

Snuggle up in these sumptuous goose down duvets, made in Germany by a long-established manufacturer.
SUMMERThe 3 tog sommer-weight duvets are filled with 100% white goose down, which makes them beautifully light. They are encased in luxurious cotton percale and stitched with an internal box construction for evenly distributed downs. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers.
AUTUMNThese light weight autumn/winter duvets are filled with 100% white goose down, which makes them warm yet beautifully light and comfortable to sleep under. Perfect for winter in countries where temperatures do not go far below zero degrees. They are encased in luxurious cotton percale and stitched with an internal box construction for evenly distributed warmth. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers.
WINTERThe 14 tog winter-weight duvets are filled with 100% white goose down, which makes them warm yet beautifully light and comfortable to sleep under. They are encased in luxurious cotton percale and stitched with an internal box construction for evenly distributed warmth. Suitable for dust mite allergy sufferers.
4-SEASONSThe 4-Season duvet consists of a very light summer duvet (48 stitched boxes) and a light spring/autumn duvet (24 stitched boxes) and can be combined to make a warm winter duvet.
The "exclusive" finish range is filled with extremely fluffy downs which gives them a particularly light feel and they are encased in an even softer 100%  cotton percale casing that is woven in Germany. The duvets are delivered in transparent zipper bags with handles which are great for storing them when not in use.
Available in standard sizes or can be made to order to your specifications.

The duvets are delivered in transparent zipper bags with handles which are great for storing them when not in use.
Available in standard sizes or can be made to order to your specifications.

Woven from luxurious 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is hand-embroidered with a galaxy of blue stars.
Fabric notes: This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Duvet covers have mother-of-pearl button closures
100% Cotton

Bring a little magic to your child’s bedroom with this dreamy bedding set.
Woven from luxurious 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is hand-embroidered with a galaxy of blue stars.
Fabric notes: This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Duvet covers have mother-of-pearl button closures
100% Cotton

An example of the highly original pottery created in the village of Tunis in Fayoum, this plate demonstrates the boldness of contemporary craftsmanship.
Featuring a playful repeating motif of an acorn in rich, autumnal colours, the eclectic and undeniably festive design of this plate will bring style to any celebration
Maker: Randa Omar
Size: 20cm / 7.8"
Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Available in a choice of sizes, these plump, extra-soft goose feather cushion pads will giveyour seating areas maximum comfort.
Each pad is filled with a 100% feather stuffing and encased in a finely woven, anti-dust mite cotton cover.

This carafe and glass will sit prettily on a bedside table. Intricately hand painted with a colourful floral and lace pattern. Each vase is unique, completely hand made and a small work of art.
Size:24cm / 9.5" highMaterial: GlassOur painted glass items are entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece is unique, making it a work of art in itself.
Size:45cm x 32cm17.8" x  12.6"100% Cotton
Size:45cm x 32cm17.8" x  12.6"100% Cotton
Size:45cm x 32cm17.8" x  12.6"100% Cotton

Bringing a new level of purity to your bathroom, this simple guest towel features a delicately embroidered hand surrounded by quaint dallies as its only motif. Impeccably crafted, it will leave your guests impressed for months to come. Available in two different colour variations.
40cm x 70cm100% Linen

Bringing a new level of purity to your bathroom, this simple guest towel features a delicately embroidered hand surrounded by quaint dallies as its only motif. Impeccably crafted, it will leave your guests impressed for months to come. Available in two different colour variations.
40cm x 70cm100% Linen

Fusing a beautiful depiction of leaves and a lively spotted background in complementary blue hues, the rich design of this platter is influenced by its potter’s surroundings in the oasis village of Tunis. Entirely handcrafted and thus unique, each bowl is a piece of art in itself.Maker: Karim El SayedSize (diameter):35 - 37cm13.8" - 14.5"
Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Add character to your room with this delicate hand corded embroidery bolster. An age old technique, this corded embroidery is taught atThreads of Hopeby master artisans in an effort to preserve the craft. This particular corded design was inspired by Soane Britain's "Rumi" Pattern, designed in collaboration with artist and geometerYasmin Hayat.
Size:85cm x 22,5cm33.5" x 8.9"Material: 100% Linen

Elevate your entertaining with these exquisitely embroidered cocktail napkins.
Woven in the finest quality linen, each napkin features finely stitched palm trees and a delicate Ajour pulled thread border.
Set of 6 napkins, measuring 12cm x 22cm / 4.7" x 8.7" each.
100% Linen

Elevate your entertaining with these exquisitely embroidered cocktail napkins.

Set of 6 napkins, measuring 12cm x 22cm / 4.7" x 8.7" each.
100% Linen

Featuring our Nakhla palm adorned with vibrant birds, this serving dish captures the charm of Egyptian oasis life. Perfect for appetisers, sweets, or as a striking decorative piece. Handcrafted in the oasis village of Fayoum.
Size:32cm x 16cm12.6'' x 6.3''Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Elevate your space with the MOON BOWL, a small, hand-crafted alabaster piece that embodies refined elegance. Its smooth, luminous surface and delicate craftsmanship make it an exquisite accent for any setting, blending timeless beauty with subtle sophistication.
Available in white or brown marbled.
Made in Luxor.
Measurements:height: 7cm / 2.8"top: 11cm / 4.3" diameterMaterial: Alabaster
Our Alabaster products are entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Elevate your dining experience with this classic placemat featuring a delicately hand-crocheted scalloped edge. Meticulously crafted by a cooperative of Nubian women in Egypt, this placemat combines timeless elegance with intricate craftsmanship, adding a touch of luxury to every meal.Size:49cm x 37cm19.3" x 14.6"Material: 100% Linen

DESCRIPTION
Combine any piece of this plain white bedding with any of our other more decorated designs or keep your bed simply plain white.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, this bedding made from superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

This hand-crafted alabaster carafe draws inspiration from ancient Egyptian artistry, blending timeless elegance with refined craftsmanship. Its smooth, translucent surface and classic silhouette make it a distinguished piece, adding a touch of historical sophistication to any setting.
Please note: alabaster is a porous stone and cannot hold water directly. If using this piece as a vase, place a glass insert or a water-filled plastic bag inside, secured with an elastic band, to protect the stone.
Made in Luxor.
Measurements:Large:      20 cm / 7.9" by 19 cm / 7.5"Medium: 15 cm / 5.9" bySmall:      10 cm / 3.9" by
Material:Alabaster
Our alabaster products are entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, subtle colour variations, and minor size differences. We believe these variations encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

An Egyptian tent border that inspired Soane Britain's ‘Rumi’ pattern, designed in collaboration with artist and geometerYasmin Hayat, was the starting point for this design. Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / beige
Description:
Create an oasis of luxury in your bedroom with our hand-embroidered palm tree bedding.
Woven in the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is finely embroidered with swaying palm trees in a variety of stitches and finished with delicate drawn thread embroidery.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Woven in the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is finely embroidered with a two-tone cross-stitch pattern and delicate hemstitch borders.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page)

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / teal
Description:
The Portugal bedding is as elegant, as it is cheerful. The intricate geometric designs, that come in array of bold colours will add a touch of playfulness to your bed.
Hand-embroidered by our most experienced craftswomen and finished with a hand-drawn border, the Portugal design is timeless.Malaika’s bedding is woven from the highest quality Egyptian cotton percale. Our 320-thread-count bedding has a unique feel: the fabric is a perfect combination of a silky-smooth touch and crispness, that only gets better with time. We are proud to make products that last a lifetime.- Duvet covers have closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

The Portugal bedding is as elegant, as it is cheerful. The intricate geometric designs, that come in array of bold colours will add a touch of playfulness to your bed.
Hand-embroidered by our most experienced craftswomen and finished with a hand-drawn border, the Portugal design is timeless.Malaika’s bedding is woven from the highest quality Egyptian cotton percale. Our 320-thread-count bedding has a unique feel: the fabric is a perfect combination of a silky-smooth touch and crispness, that only gets better with time. We are proud to make products that last a lifetime.- Duvet covers have closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

The Portugal bedding is as elegant, as it is cheerful. The intricate geometric designs, that come in array of bold colours will add a touch of playfulness to your bed.
Hand-embroidered by our most experienced craftswomen and finished with a hand-drawn border, the Portugal design is timeless.Malaika’s bedding is woven from the highest quality Egyptian cotton percale. Our 320-thread-count bedding has a unique feel: the fabric is a perfect combination of a silky-smooth touch and crispness, that only gets better with time. We are proud to make products that last a lifetime.- Duvet covers have closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton

An example of the highly original craftsmanship from the oasis village of Tunis in Fayoum, this visually striking plate is the perfect addition to your ceramic collection.Depicting a pair of palm trees, this plate’s naive design was inspired by the maker’s surroundings in the spectacular oasis of Fayoum, located to the west of Egypt’s Nile River.Maker: Mohamed Mahmoud
Size (diameter):12 - 13cm4.7" - 5.1"Material:Plate: Clay, Fire clay from Aswan - upper EgyptSurface material: Lead-free glazeColours of earthen oxides.
Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Description:
Decorated with shimmering dragonflies, our Rania collection will add a touch of glamour and sparkle to your bedroom. This popular collection is now available in two additional summery colors.

100% Egyptian Cotton

Woven from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each dragonfly is hand-embroidered using silver outline stitches and the finest satin stitches.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Featuring a dashing zigzag pattern and available in five joyful hues, the Julia napkin asks to be mixed and matched for maximum eclecticity. Minimal but full of spirit, it will lend an effortlessly playful touch to table settings. Each piece is of course embroidered in Cairo, by the wonderful women of the Malaika Embroidery Training Centre (TOH), machine washable and crafted in the finest of linen.
Size: 46cm x 46cmMaterial: 100% Linen

Framed with a painterly design inspired by the geometric shapes of the Pharaonic period, and coloured with gold and terracotta, these cards etch together layers of Egyptian history.Perfect for both invitations or menus, our multipurpose Pharaohs cards will bring another layer to your beautiful tablescapes. 300gsm paper card.
Size: 13cm x 18cm

With simple shapes and colourful accents, the minimalist design of our Lotus Candleholder is effortlessly stylish. It would make the perfect gift for someone with a similar love of handcrafted pieces.
Pair with the accompanying Lotus Candleholders to make the most of the full range.Hand blown from recycled glass by an artisan in Old Cairo, exemplifying the beauty of Egyptian craft.
Size (height):12cm - 13cm4.7" - 5.1"
Material: GlassThis product is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Beautifully presented, our Rococo Roses gift set is the perfect present for newborns and baby showers.
This four-piece set includes a plain flat sheet which can be monogrammed with the initials of your choice, scented pouch (unfilled) and laundry bag, woven from 100% Egyptian cotton percale and hand-embroidered with delicate rosebuds and dots.
The  flat top sheet is made from Egyptian cotton voile and also hand-embroidered with our Rococo Roses rosebuds and dots.
Crib top sheet -   70cm x 100cmScented pouch - 10cm x 10cmLaundry bag -      38,5cm x 51cmPlain flat Sheet -  90cm x 150cm
100% Cotton

The all-around Ajour detailing adds a touch of elegance to your table setting. Experience the artistry and sophistication of this exclusive piece.

Create a sense of occasion at every meal with this ladder stitch tablecloth.
Hand-crafted from beautifully textured linen, it is decorated with rows of pulled-thread openwork embroidery and a hemstitch border. Pulled-thread open work is a very precise, painstaking embroidery technique that involves cutting and pulling individual threads to create an open, lace-like effect.
Size:150cm x 300cm118" x 59"
100% Linen

Elevate your dining experience with the Palmera Soup Bowl, featuring an elegant design of interlocking palm trees  around the outside of the bowl. This charming bowl combines bold naivity with practical use, making every serving a stylish statement. Perfect for soups or any favorite dish, it adds a touch of refined tropical charm to your table.
Skillfully hand made in the oasis village of Tunis, allow it to immerse your dinner guests into the environment it was crafted in.
Size:25-27cm diameter, height 11-12cm9,8"-10,6" diamter, height 4.3"
Material:Plate: Clay, Fire clay from Aswan - upper EgyptSurface material: Lead-free glazeColours of earthen oxides.

Each set includes:
1 embroidered flat cot sheet (110cm x 170cm)1 plain cot fitted sheet (70cm x 140cm x 14cm)
100% cotton

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / teal
Description:
Simple yet highly sophisticated, the Montaza bedding range showcases pulled-thread embroidery at its finest.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is beautifully detailed with drawn thread open work – a precise, painstaking embroidery technique that involves cutting, pulling and wrapping individual threads to create an open, lace-like effect.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton

Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is beautifully detailed with drawn thread open work – a precise, painstaking embroidery technique that involves cutting, pulling and wrapping individual threads to create an open, lace-like effect.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / beige
Description:
Classic yet contemporary, our Poplin Pleat collection is a refined choice for any bedroom.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it features hand-pleated cotton poplin pleats which are sewn together by hand using the utmost precision.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Add a touch of whimsy to your tablescape with our Menya Dessert Bowl. Embellished with flower motifs, its symmetry is particularly pleasing. Allow it to whisk you to a beautiful flower garden, or breathe in the smell of fresh blossom.Match with the Menya Dessert Plate and the Menya Dinner Plate for a delightful table setting.Made entirely by hand by the talented potters in the village of Tunis, in Fayoum.
Size (diameter):20cm7.9"Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Show off this little donkey ornament on a bookshelf, desk or console table to bring distinctive flair into your home. Hand-crafted from high-fired Aswan clay, the piece draws inspiration from traditional Egypitian living (the creature was the most important load carrier in Ancient Egypt) as well as ancient Egyptian iconography: the donkey was in fact the symbol of the Egyptian sun god Ra.Maker: Saleh LuxorSize:15 x 30 x 25cm5.9" x 11.8" x 9.8"
Material:Clay, Fire clay from Aswan - upper EgyptSurface material: Lead-free glazeColours of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Add character to your room with this delicate hand corded embroidery throw. An age old technique, this corded embroidery is taught atThreads of Hopeby master artisans in an effort to preserve the craft. This particular corded design was inspired by Soane Britain's new "Rumi" Pattern, designed in collaboration with artist and geometerYasmin Hayat.
Size:145cm x 200cm47.1” x 78.7”Material: 100% Linen

Cover yourself with these perfect, luxurious mulberry silk duvets during the warm summer months. Mulberry silk is naturally temperature as well as humidity regulating and breathable. Therefore, it keeps your body heat in when nights are cool, and lets it out in milder nights.
Due to natural repellants against mite, bacteria and fungi, silk is almost free of microorganisms and thus very suitable for people suffering from allergies.
Available in standard sizes or can be made to order to your specifications.
We also offer them in thicker all year and winter quality, please ask us for prices.

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / beige
Description:
The clean lines and modern sophistication of the Siwa Plissée collection make it a versatile addition to any bedroom.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is decorated with pleated borders and framed with corded piping in a choice of colours.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.

Decorated with overlapping strikes and painted in green and blue hues, simplicity is the key with our Trellis Bowl. Versatile yet eye-catching, it will add a touch of colour and pattern to any table arrangement. Mix and match with our other Fayoum pottery for an eclectic tablescape.Handcrafted by the potters in Fayoum.
Size (diameter x height):13cm x 8cm5.1" x 3.1"Material:Frame: Clay, Fire Clay from Aswan - upper EgyptCover material: Gliss free of leadColors of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

Our Trellis Carafe Set is an elegant addition to the bedroom and the perfect gift as a house guest. Hand blown by artisans in the heart of Old Cairo, using a traditional technique said to be created in Ancient Egypt. Embellished with overlapping stripes and dots in multicoloured hues.Perfect for by your bedside, or for serving summer drinks.
Size (height): 21cm / 8.3"
Material: Glass

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / blue
Description:
One of our signature ranges, the Shashiko collection features colourful stitching inspired by traditional Japanese embroidery.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is hand-embroidered with double rows of cross-stitch and pulled thread hemstitch borders, creating a highly intricate design.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, it is hand-embroidered with double rows of cross-stitch and pulled thread hemstitch borders, creating a highly intricate design.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Celebrate special occasions with this luxurious tablecloth, embellished with shimmering hand-embroidery.
Crafted from the finest linen, it is exquisitely decorated with the Tally stitch, an ancient form of single stitch embroidery using gold threads. The embroiderer makes one stitch at a time, then cuts the thread off and moves on to work on the next stitch, so that the stitch looks the same at the front and back. The tablecloth is finished with all hand pulled and embroidered hemstitch borders.
Size:150cm x 300cm118" x 59"Material: 100% Linen

The top sheet is made from delicate Egyptian cotton voile and also hand-embroidered with our blue stars.

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / blue
Description:
Give your bedroom a contemporary edge with the Seraga bedding range, which showcases the finest hand embroidery.
Crafted from the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is beautifully decorated with perfectly placed stitching, creating a striking geometric pattern. In order to ensure perfect lines of running stitches individual threads are pulled to give a precise guideline for embroidery.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton

This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton

100% Linen

Variant: Flat Sheet / King Size (275cm x 290cm) / beige
Description:
Simple yet elegant, it’s easy to see why the Sinai range is one of our most popular collections.
Woven in the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is expertly finished with corded piping in a choice of colours.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton
If you can’t find your size: We are proud to offer our luxury bed linen in all bed sizes including all US-sizes (Twin, Twin XL, Queen, King and California King etc.) without additional cost. Please contact our customer service by mail (customer-service@malaikalinens.com) or call +49 30 804 990 42 for your inquiry.
Pictured with filling. Pillows/Duvets not included, available to order separately (see bottom of page).

Variant: Cushion Cover / Small Square (40cm x 40cm) / orange
Description:
Simple yet elegant, it’s easy to see why the Sinai range is one of our most popular collections.
Woven in the highest quality 320-thread-count 100% Egyptian cotton percale, each piece is expertly finished with corded piping in a choice of colours.
This superior quality cotton combines a soft, silky-smooth feel with the crispness and durability of a percale weave.
- Duvet covers have button closures- Pillow cases have an envelope closure- Large cushion covers come in sets of two and have a button closure
100% Egyptian Cotton

Hand sculpted and kiln fired in the oasis village of Tunis in Fayoum, this bowl features a symmetrical and abstract design inspired by the sea.Maker: Karim El SayedSize (diameter):40 - 45cm15.7" - 17.7"Material:Bowl: Clay, Fire clay from Aswan - upper EgyptSurface material: Lead-free glazeColours of earthen oxides.Our Fayoum Pottery is entirely handcrafted, so please allow for slight imperfections, little colour differences, and minor sizing differentiation. We believe these differences encapsulate the beauty and charm of handmade items. Every piece of our Fayoum Pottery is unique, making it a work of art in itself.

An example of the highly original and heartwarming craftsmanship found in the oasis village of Tunis in Fayoum, this visually striking goat planter is the perfect addition to your ceramic collection. Use it with flowers or plants and add some warmth to your home.Maker: Mohamed MahmoudSize (to hold pots of the following size):Large: 12cm - 13cm  / 4.7" - 5,2" inside diameterMedium: 10cm - 11.5cm /  3.9" - 4.3" inside diameter

This beautiful napkin will bring a simple elegance to your dining table.
One of our signature ranges, the Shashiko collection features colourful stitching inspired by traditional Japanese embroidery.
The napkin is hand-embroidered with double rows of cross-stitch and pulled thread hemstitch borders, creating a highly intricate design.Size:50cm x 50cm19.7" x 19.7"
100% Linen
